images.alt: DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped Chocolate Frozen Desert Cones, Multipack, 6 x 63 ml.
drumstick chockolate fudge brownie king cones

text: The creamy, crunchy, classic Simply Dipped Chocolate DRUMSTICK now comes in a mini-sized treat. DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped Chocolate 6-Pack doubles the chocolate flavour featuring a creamy-tasting frozen chocolatey dessert dipped in our rich, signature chocolatey dip. Made with dairy from Canadian cows, this 6-Pack is smaller in size, but just as big in taste that is sure to excite your buds and tastebuds alike. Raise your cone to DRUMSTICK goodness!
Frozen treat with creamy-tasting chocolatey dessert dipped in chocolatey coating
DRUMSTICK has been THE ORIGINAL SUNDAE CONE® for over 80 years
